message.name: ERR_APPEALEDCASE_XRV_CLOSED
message.locale: The appealed case cannot be modified as the appeal case is closed.

message.name: ERR_APPEALEDCASE_XRV_DECISION_MADE
message.locale: The appealed case cannot be modified as a decision has been made on the appeal.

message.name: ERR_APPEALEDCASE_XRV_REMOVED_FROM_APPEAL
message.locale: The appealed case has been removed from the appeal and cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_APPEALEDCASE_XRV_EFFECTIVEDATE_ALREADY_APPROVED
message.locale: Cannot modify the effective date for an approved case.

message.name: ERR_APPEALEDCASE_XRV_RECEIPTDATE_ALREADY_APPROVED
message.locale: Cannot modify the receipt date for an approved case.

message.name: ERR_APPEALEDCASE_XRV_RECEIPTMETHOD_ALREADY_APPROVED
message.locale: Cannot modify the receipt method for an approved case.

message.name: ERR_APPEALEDCASE_XFV_EFFECTIVEDATE_BEFORE_REGDATE
message.locale: The effective date must not be before the registration date of the case being appealed.

message.name: ERR_APPEALEDCASE_XRV_RECEIPTDATE_BEFORE_ENDDATE
message.locale: The receipt date must not be before the end date of the appeal case being appealed.

message.name: ERR_APPEALEDCASE_XRV_RECEIPTDATE_BEFORE_REGDATE
message.locale: The receipt date must not be before the registration date of the case being appealed.

message.name: ERR_APPEALEDCASE_XRV_ALREADY_REMOVED
message.locale: The appealed case has already been removed from the appeal.

message.name: ERR_APPEALEDCASE_XRV_CANNOT_REMOVE
message.locale: The appealed case cannot be removed as there must be at least one appealed case for the appeal.

message.name: ERR_APPEALEDCASE_XRV_NOT_ACTIVE
message.locale: Can only update appealed case resolutions for active appeal cases.

message.name: ERR_APPEALEDCASE_XRV_DECISION_SUBMITTED
message.locale: Cannot modify the appealed case resolution as appeal decision has been submitted for approval.

message.name: ERR_APPEALEDCASE_XRV_DECISION_APPROVED
message.locale: Cannot modify the appealed case resolution as appeal decision has been approved.

message.name: ERR_APPEALEDCASE_XRV_NO_FINAL_HEARING
message.locale: Cannot modify the appealed case resolution as the final hearing has not been held for this appeal case.

message.name: INF_APPEALEDCASE_XRV_UPDATE_DOCUMENT
message.locale: The decision document needs to be updated.

message.name: ERR_APPEALEDCASE_XRV_NO_DECISION
message.locale: Cannot modify the appealed case resolution as no hearing decision exists.

message.name: ERR_APPEALEDCASE_XRV_CANNOT_REMOVE_APPROVED
message.locale: Cannot delete as there must be at least one approved appealed case for an approved appeal case.

message.name: ERR_APPEALEDCASE_XRV_FINAL_NO_HEARING_HELD
message.locale: Cannot modify the resolution as the final hearing for the appeal case has not yet been held.

message.name: ERR_APPEALEDCASE_XFV_EFFECTIVEDATE_BEFORE_CASESTARTDATE
message.locale: The received date must not be before the registration date of the case being appealed.

message.name: ERR_APPEALEDCASE_XRV_RESOLUTIONAPPRDATE_LATER_STARTDATE
message.locale: The Resolution Approval Date must not be later than the Start Date of the Appeal Case.

message.name: ERR_APPEALEDCASE_XFV_RESOLUTIONDATE_BEFORE_CASESTARTDATE
message.locale: The Resolution Approval Date must not be before the registration date of the case being appealed.
